name: sonarr
description: Sonarr is a self-hosted TV series manager that automatically downloads, renames, and organizes episodes for Usenet and torrent users, integrating with indexers and media servers.
features: Automated downloads: Monitors RSS feeds and automatically downloads new episodes.
Quality profiles: Defines preferred quality settings and upgrade rules for episodes.
Series tracking: Tracks TV shows with automatic season and episode detection.
Calendar view: Displays upcoming and recently aired episodes in calendar format.
Usenet and torrent: Integrates with download clients like SABnzbd, NZBGet, and qBittorrent.
Indexer support: Connects to Usenet indexers and torrent trackers for content discovery.
File renaming: Automatically renames downloaded files with customizable naming schemes.
Missing episodes: Identifies and searches for missing episodes in your collection.
Media server integration: Updates Plex, Kodi, Emby, and Jellyfin libraries automatically.
Custom scripts: Triggers custom scripts on download completion or import.
Multi-language: Searches for episodes in multiple languages with subtitle support.
API access: Provides REST API for automation and third-party app integration.
